meanings.definition: Inflammation of the gums, characterized by discharge of pus.
meanings.sent1: The dentist diagnosed her with pyorrhea after noticing pus coming from her gums.
meanings.sent2: Pyorrhea can cause gum pain and swelling, making it uncomfortable to eat.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds funny, pyorrhea is no joke when it comes to oral health.
meanings.sent4: The garden of gums was overrun with pyorrhea, the pus flowing like a polluted river.
meanings.sent5: The sight of pus oozing from her gums due to pyorrhea was enough to make anyone cringe.

meanings.definition: A disease of the gums characterized by inflammation and discharge of pus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that pyorrhea is a serious gum disease that requires treatment.
meanings.sent2: People with pyorrhea may experience bad breath due to the infection in their gums.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about a gum disease called pyorrhea had the audience laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her smile, once bright and healthy, now marred by the shadow of pyorrhea creeping in.
meanings.sent5: The classroom fell silent as the teacher described the gruesome effects of pyorrhea on oral health.
